Bob Benson has a nice Akao tsuba on his site.
This identical tsuba is pictured in the
Tsuba Kanshoki, 2nd Ed. and has a mei
of Echizen ju Akao. Unfortunately
Bob's has had the mei punched down for
some reason. 

http://www.bushidojapaneseswords.com/kiriscrolltsuba.JPG
